name: Optimus OPT
description: Optimus is a Tesla meme and NFT-Fi project founded by early adoption Tesla Stock holders. The first project in our eco-system will be OptimuSwap, which allows holders to take part in Farming, Pools, and Staking. Users can stake tokens like OPT, WBNB, BTCB, OPT-BNB LP tokens to earn $OPT, with a high rate APR.
